summary: 57 English glosses to Aldhelm’s prose De laude virginitatis, of the same date as the main text, and added after Latin glosses to it. Flyleaf inscription localises manuscript to Cirencester (Ker 1957, p. 157).

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: (fol. 2v) ad pontificale, episcopale, biscoplicum / conciliabulum colloquium synoðe

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Fifty-seven glosses to Aldhelm, De laude virginitatis, in the prose version

admin: Manuscript described by Mary Swan and Owen Roberson with the assistance of Johanna Green, with reference to published scholarship.
